scripts.swagger:build: npm run swagger:clean && npm run swagger:build:dotnet && npm run swagger:build:json && npm run swagger:build:autorest
scripts.swagger:build:dotnet: (dotnet tool install -g --version 6.2.3 Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Cli | dotnet tool restore) && cd ../src/Reshopper && dotnet clean && dotnet build && cd ../../frontend
scripts.swagger:build:autorest: autorest --reset && autorest --use=@autorest/typescript@6.0.0-beta.13 --allow-insecure-connection=true --generate-metadata=true --clear-output-folder --package-name=@reshopper-retail/client --license-header=false --v3 --markOpenAPI3ErrorsAsWarning --typescript --input-file=./apps/retail/api/swagger.json --output-folder=./apps/retail/api/openapi && cd ./apps/retail/api/openapi && npm install && npm version 1.0.0 && npm run build && npm pack && cd ../../../../ && npm run swagger:build:autorest:reinstall
scripts.swagger:build:autorest:reinstall: rimraf ./apps/retail/api/openapi/**/*[!.tgz] && (npm uninstall @reshopper-retail/client | echo already-uninstalled) && npm i ./apps/retail/api/openapi/reshopper-retail-client-1.0.0.tgz
